code: import{Http}from'../../config/Http';import{changeLoading}from'./loading.action';import{changeNotify}from'./notify.action';export var actionTypes={CHANGE:'PROBLEM_CHANGE',ERROR:'PROBLEM_ERROR',SUCCESS:'PROBLEM_SUCCESS'};export var changeProblem=function changeProblem(data){return{type:actionTypes.CHANGE,data:data};};export var errorProblem=function errorProblem(data){return{type:actionTypes.ERROR,data:data};};export var successProblem=function successProblem(data){return{type:actionTypes.SUCCESS,data:data};};export var enviarProblema=function enviarProblema(data){return function(dispatch){dispatch(changeLoading({open:true,msg:'Enviando problema...'}));return Http.post('/problem',{nome:data.nome,email:data.email,telefone:data.telefone,problema:data.problema}).then(function(response){dispatch(changeLoading({open:false}));if(typeof response!=='undefined'){dispatch(changeNotify({open:true,class:'success',msg:'Enviado com sucesso.'}));}}).catch(function(error){dispatch(changeLoading({open:false}));if(error.response){dispatch(changeNotify({open:true,class:'danger',msg:'Algo deu errado, por favor contacte o suporte.'}));}});};};
